name: ParameterValue
documentation:
Wrapper around a {@link io.jooby.value.Value} representing a resolved parameter value in a web request.

This class is used internally by Fluxzero to abstract over raw parameter values retrieved from different parts of a {@link WebRequestContext} (such as query strings, form data, path variables, headers, or cookies).

The value is backed by Joobyâ€™s {@link io.jooby.value.Value} type, which provides flexible conversion and null-safe access to typed values.

Usage

{@code ParameterValue} instances are returned by methods such as:
  • {@link WebRequestContext#getParameter(String, WebParameterSource...)}
  • {@link WebRequestContext#getQueryParameter(String)}
  • {@link WebRequestContext#getFormParameter(String)}
These are used during web handler method resolution to supply method argument values. @see WebRequestContext @see io.jooby.value.Value

fields.name: value
fields.documentation: The underlying Jooby {@link io.jooby.value.Value} representing the parameter.

methods.name: as
